0111111011010101 0111101101101011 0 -> sum: 1111101001000000, cout: 0

1000000100000101 1011011000011101 1 -> sum: 0011011100100011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
